article_title: GOP Presidential Hopefuls Focus Ire More at Obama Than Clinton at New Hampshire Forum
article_text:
NASHUA, N.H.—The New Hampshire Republican Party is distributing red “#stophillary” bumper stickers ahead of Hillary Clinton’s first visit to the state on Monday as an official 2016 presidential candidate.

And yet with 18 announced and likely Republican presidential candidates in the state this weekend for a forum, virtually all of the focus has been on the present occupant of the White House, not the Democratic Party’s odds-on 2016...

twitter.description: With 18 announced and likely Republican presidential candidates in New Hampshire this weekend for a forum virtually all of the focus has been on Barack Obama, and not Hillary Clinton.
twitter.title: GOP Presidential Hopefuls Focus Ire More at Obama Than Clinton at New Hampshire Forum
